name: Space Rocks (itch) (Todd D. Vance)
description:
Classic arcade action! Power your ship through a field of rocky space debris and shoot them first into smaller chunks and then into oblivion to score.

Features:

Visual and audio effects

Music

Gamepad or Keyboard

High Score saving

Options screen

Use arrows or WASD or gamepad stick to play, vertical for acceleration and horizontal for rotation. Fire button, left mouse button, or left Ctrl key to fire.
